resources.string: This app regularly receives updates to help improve existing features or add additional features based on user feedback and suggestions. You can check the details of the latest updates below!\n\nPlease note: the content on this page will not be translated into other languages.

This offline notepad app has been created and is maintained by myself; the person who has written this message: Gino Basiletti.

Over christmas 2018 my father was using one of the many notepad apps which are available on the Google Play Store which he was keeping all of his notes on, when one day the server that the app was backing the notes up onto was hacked and he subsequently lost all of his notes.

It is very common these days for apps to have server connectivity, so they can back data up and allow you to retrieve it across multiple devices. However, that approach obviously runs the risk of the developer of the app seeing your notes, and if the place where your notes are backed up on becomes compromised, you run the risk of your notes being seen by hackers as well - and nobody wants that!

With that in mind, I decided to create this notepad app which functions entirely offline. No server syncs or logging in; just a plain old pad of paper (so to speak).

However, I also feel that it is important for you to have the ease of moving your notes onto other devices should you change your smart phone for example; so you are able to do so by exporting the notes (within this app) to a file, emailing it to yourself and then importing it back in from your email and onto your new device.

The point being, you are in complete control of your notes and this app will never store them anywhere but your device - and I intend on keeping it that way. Hopefully this little essay will help reassure you of that!

If you have any suggestions on how you would like this app improved (or just want to send me a 'thank you'), please feel free to send me an email below!
Best wishes, and happy note taking!\n
This folder is currently empty.\nTap the + at the bottom right to add content to it!
You currently have no notes.\nTap the + at the bottom right to start adding content!
Start typing to search across all of your notes!
What would you like to name your new folder?
You are currently in the \'%s\' folder. What would you like to change its name to?
This note is not accessible - you may have deleted it. Tap the settings icon on the home screen widget to choose a new one.
Sorry, your note is too large to copy to the clipboard.
This note has no previous saves yet
This app currently only supports pasting text into your notes.
Tap the padlock icon at the top to enable editing
Tap the top-right icon above to place one of your notes here!

When you make edits to your notes or lists, the app will save a copy of it at that time so you can revert to older versions if you wish.\n\nDo you wish to delete all of your saved revisions? This will only delete the old saves and not the notes/lists themselves.
Stop saving revisions from now on
If you wish to use this list as a template, you may create a copy of it to keep this one unedited.
This list has no previous saves yet
Offer to split an extremely large note into smaller parts when opening it

Your note is currently longer than the recommended length of 25,000 characters or less. Having a large note can cause app instability and slowness when editing.

To help prevent this, your note could be split up into %1$d parts and placed into a new folder if you wish. Your current note will then be flagged for deletion afterwards.

Would you like to split this note up into smaller parts now?
Create a new note for this text
Create a new list for this text
Add this text to an existing note/list
Adding to: none selected\n(tap to change)
Create a new item in the list
Create a new line on my currently focused list item
Undoes the last edit if any have been made since accessing this screen.
Redoes the last undo. Note: if you have manually edited content since you last tapped undo, this will not work.
Copies the contents of your note to your clipboard.
Pastes the content from your clipboard to the current cursor position on notes, or at the end of your currently focused item on lists. Note: You may only paste text into this app.
Searches the note for occurrences of your search criteria and highlights them. Displays the number of occurrences and enables you to flick between them.
Searches the list for occurrences of your search criteria and highlights them. Displays the number of occurrences and enables you to flick between them.
Inserts the current date & time wherever your cursor currently is (applies to titles, note bodies and list items).
Allows you to share the content of your note out to another app.
Allows you to share the content of your list out to another app.
Creates a tab space at the start of your current focused item. Items can be tabbed/indented up to 5 times.
Removes a tab space at the start of your current focused item if there are any there.
Displays all previous revisions/saves of this note. Allows you to load out an old revision, or delete it.
Displays all previous revisions/saves of this list. Allows you to load out an old revision, or delete it.
Tells you how many words and letters are in your note body.
Allows you to turn \'Tap to unlock\' on or off. If it is turned on, when accessing notes or lists you will have to tap the padlock icon at the top to be able to edit content.
Lets you choose between adding a new list item or adding a new line to your currently focused list item when hitting the enter/return key.
Adds a new empty item to start of your list.
Adds a new empty item to your list. The item is added after your current focused item. If no item is focused, nothing will happen.
Deletes your focused list item. If your list contains only one item or no item is currently focused, nothing will be deleted.
Allows you to filter your list items by their checked state. This can be set so that you see all items, complete items or incomplete items instead.
Displays a dialog which allows you to create a copy of your list. Allows you to give it a title, and choose whether you wish to duplicate the previous saves of the current list also.
Checks or unchecks all items in your list. The first time this is pressed it will uncheck all items, then flips each time you press it again (reverts back to unchecking if you reload your list).
You are about to delete these items; are you sure?
This action cannot be reversed. You can change this so that deleted items can be made recoverable in settings.
You can change this so that deleted items can be made recoverable in settings.
Deleted items are recoverable for %s. You can see your deleted items in settings.

WARNING: Your selected folder(s) have %1$d %2$s inside of them! This content will also be %3$s.

%4$s

Are you sure?
You are about to move your selected items to the top layer / \'root folder\'
You are about to move your selected items to the folder \'%s\'

Since its creation in 2018, this app has received regular updates containing new features and improvements. It is developed and maintained by just 1 person (myself), and I am not running a business of any sort. This app is entirely free to use & does not contain ads - and I intend on keeping it that way!
My time working on this app regularly gets spent:
\u2022 Listening & quickly responding to your questions, feedback & constructive criticism given to me in emails & on the Google Play Store
\u2022 Monitoring crash logs, resolving any unexpected issues you encounter within this app & making any required bug fixes as quickly as possible
\u2022 Planning, designing & implementing brand new features such as folders, lists, PINs, biometric security & app themes (to name a few!)
\u2022 Revisiting & making improvements to existing parts of the app so that your experience throughout is always as seamless & natural as possible
\u2022 Continuously keeping up to date with new Android version releases & supporting older ones as far back as Android KitKat; as well as any devices with lower specs & capabilities

I thoroughly appreciate the messages of kindness which I regularly receive from you all! It gives me great pleasure to know that I have helped make a difference in your lives no matter how big or small that difference may be! I am also very grateful for any of those who wish to show their appreciation by donating below.
Help pay my rent (a guy can dream, right?): £299.99
Your donation is hugely appreciated! Would you like to email me about your donation too?

Sorry, but there was an error setting up the billing for your donation. You may want to check that you have payments set up on your Google Play Store account.\n\nIf this problem persists, please drop me an email and let me know!
Please choose the password that you wish to use for this app. Your password length must be between 1 and 20, and may include digits.

If you set your password to never reset upon forgetting it, you may never be able to access your notes again! Please be careful when doing this.\n\nYou may wish to back your notes up via the \'Transfer notes\' section on the home screen as a safety precaution, should you ever forget your password.
Warning: if you forget your password your notes will become inaccessible. Be careful!

Setting a password for this app will help ensure that your notes can't be seen if somebody else gets hold of your device.

As this is an offline notepad app, you will NOT be able to recover a forgotten password via an email reset link like you may be used to in most modern day apps. If you forget your password you may have to wait some length of time for the app to remove it for security reasons.

The longer you set your reset timer to, the more secure your notes are if your device falls into the wrong hands. However, it may also cause a greater inconvenience for you if you do happen to forget what your password is.
Please re-enter the password to confirm it
Your entered passwords do not match
Authenticate with your fingerprint to enable fingerprint unlocking for this app
You currently do not have a password set for this app. It is recommended that you do. Tap here to create one!
You currently have a password set for this app. Tap to remove it.
Your inactivity timeout length is currently set to %s.
Authentication will be required when you exceed your inactivity timeout length. The inactivity timer only starts when this app is not open on your device screen.
Your reset timer is currently set to %s.
Your password reset timer is the chosen amount of time the app will take to delete your password should you forget it and request for it to be deleted.
You currently have fingerprint unlocking enabled. Tap to remove it.
You currently do not have fingerprint unlocking enabled. Tap here to enable it!
Lock this app to portrait only
Lock this app to landscape only
Allow this app to rotate orientation with your device
Please choose your preferred reset timer below:
Prevent my device from locking due to inactivity when this app is open
Set the navigation bar (back/home/overview button area) to match the app background colour
Allow the titles of my notes, lists and folders to span multiple lines
Save revision copies of my notes/lists when I make changes to them
Folders: show icon and amount of items inside
Lists: show icon and progress overview
Delete all of my saved revisions
Show a small preview of my lists and notes beneath their titles
Set to the primary language on my device (non-English translations may be inaccurate)
Set to English (the spoken language of the app creator)
Order my notes, lists and folders alphabetically
Allow me to drag & reorder my notes, lists and folders as I wish
Display progress indicator above list items
Display progress indicator as a percentage

Select the file you wish to import.

Offline Notepad will attempt to distinguish between whether your file was previously exported from this app or not.

Please note: You must choose to make your file re-importable during the export process; otherwise the importer will think that you are just importing regular text and import it all as one item instead.

If you are exporting your notes to later re-import them back into this app, then you must choose to enable re-importing below. To maximise your security, re-importable files are also encrypted.\n\nIf you just want to export your notes to read them elsewhere, then you can choose to make them reader friendly instead. This will make the exported file easier to read, but the app will not properly recognise the file if you attempt to re-import it at a later time.
Just make my notes reader friendly
You have no notes, lists or folders to export
Something appears to have broken. Please try toggling the transfer type or reloading the screen.

You can also include the 10 most recent saves/revisions of each of your notes in the exported file. This may make the export file much larger.\n\nIf you are choosing to make your export type reader friendly so you can read your notes elsewhere, it is recommended that you do NOT include previous saves in the export because they may make the exported file difficult to read.
Failed to create export file. Please reload this screen and try again.
Could not locate data from your chosen file. Please try again.
Could not find any importable content. Please try another file.
Previewing your file contents below. Your file will be imported into one new note.

Previewing your file contents below. Your file will be imported into one new note.\n\nPlease note: only the first 1,000 characters of your file are being previewed below. The rest of the file will still be imported.
You have not selected any items

-Backup scheduling allows you to save regular backup copies of your notes to your device. You can also back your notes up manually at any time via the 'Transfer Notes' option found in the navigation drawer on the home screen.

-You may choose how often you want these backups to be below. The app will prompt you to backup when you open the app again after that length of time has elapsed (if you have notes).

-Latest backup: %s

It has now been longer than %s since you last backed up your notes. Would you like to back them up now?\n\nYou can snooze this reminder for 6 hours if you wish. Alternatively, you can edit this feature in settings.
The backup prompt has been snoozed for 6 hours
Are you sure you wish to delete %d Item(s)? These item(s) will not be recoverable!
Would you like to recover these item(s)? Please note that any items which were previously in sub-folders will also be moved to the root folder.
There are currently no items marked for deletion!
Below is a preview of what the app will look like with the selected theme.
Below is a preview of what the app will look like with your custom theme.\n\nYou can customise it after clicking apply!

If you already know the exact colour that you want, you can manually enter the hex code for it below.\n\nIf you aren\'t sure about how to do this, it is recommended that you use the picker tab instead.

Tip: Hex colour codes are values that describe how much of a colour to show.

They are constructed in the form of #FFAABBCC where:

-They are preceded by a hash tag (#)

-FF represents the alpha/transparency value, where FF is a solid colour (0% transparency)

-AA Represents the amount of colour red to display

-BB Represents the amount of colour green to display

-CC Represents the amount of colour blue to display

-Each channel represents itself in the range of 00-FF (hexadecimal values)
The background colour, divider line colour and text colour seen on widgets you can add to the home screen of your device.
The base background colour seen across pretty much every screen in the app.
The colour of the background when an item is selected. Examples: long-pressing notes to move/delete them.
The colour of the background when it is highlighted. Examples: Notes marked as favourites, unread news/update posts.
The colour of the floating action button background (usually seen as the + button you tap to make a new note/list/folder).
The colour of the background when a success banner is being shown.
The colour of the background when an error banner is being shown.
The thin divider lines that help separate sections out on screens throughout the app.
The background colour of buttons seen throughout the app.
Toggle between the status bar icons (wifi, battery, etc.) being black or white.
The text colour for header text, normally found at the top of screens.
The text colour for descriptions found throughout the app (the majority of text you see).
The text colour for buttons seen throughout the app.
The colour of the floating action button text (usually seen as the + button you tap to make a new note/list/folder).
The text colour for when a success banner is shown.
The text colour for when an error banner is shown.
The colour tint applied to icons found within the headers of the app.
The colour tint applied to icons found throughout the app (not in headers).
The colour of the checkable radio buttons and checkboxes found throughout the app.
The colour of the surrounding box and label for an input field that is currently focused.
The colour of the surrounding box and label for an input field that is not currently focused.
The highlight colour of the matched search criteria that you are currently focused on when searching in notes/lists.
The highlight colour of the matched search criteria that you are currently not focused on when searching in notes/lists.
The main background colour of the notepad widget that you can add to the home screen of your device.
The divider line colour of the notepad widget that you can add to the home screen of your device.
The text colour of the notepad widget that you can add to the home screen of your device.
